analyze_emotions_from_url.description: Start a batch emotion analysis job for media files hosted at URLs

props.name: urls
props.description: URLs to media files to analyze (images, videos, audio). Supports up to 100 URLs or archives (.zip, .tar.gz)

props.name: models
props.description: Specify which models to use for inference. Leave empty to run all models.

props.name: transcription
props.description: Include speech-to-text transcription in the analysis

props.name: callbackUrl
props.description: Optional webhook URL to receive results when the job completes

props.name: notify
props.description: Send email notification upon job completion or failure

create_voice.description: Save a custom voice to your account using a TTS generation ID

props.name: generationId
props.description: The unique ID from a previous TTS generation to save as a custom voice

props.name: voiceName
props.description: A descriptive name for your custom voice

delete_voice.description: Delete a custom voice from your account

props.name: voiceName
props.description: The name of the custom voice to delete

generate_speech_from_file.description: Convert audio file to speech using Hume AI\

props.name: text
props.description: The text to convert to speech

props.name: voiceDescription
props.description: Natural language description of how the speech should sound (tone, accent, style, etc.). If no voice is specified, this will generate a dynamic voice.

props.name: format
props.description: The output audio file format

props.name: speed
props.description: Speed multiplier for the synthesized speech (0.75-1.5 recommended)

props.name: contextText
props.description: Optional context text to influence speech style and prosody consistency

props.name: contextDescription
props.description: Description for the context text (how it should sound)

props.name: trailingSilence
props.description: Duration of silence to add at the end of the speech

props.name: splitUtterances
props.description: Automatically split text into natural-sounding speech segments

get_emotion_results.description: Retrieve emotion analysis predictions from a completed batch job

props.name: jobId
props.description: The ID of the emotion analysis job to retrieve results for
